name: dark-mode-enabler
description: Chrome extension designed to help you enable Dark Mode or at least, invert colors to release your eyes from the white light of the screen.

scripts.publish: vite build && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: added website build' && git push origin main && git push origin --delete gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages

author: codesandtags
